sentences.en: A thin twist of smoke curled from the cottage's single chimney.
sentences.cn: 一缕盘旋的轻烟从农舍唯一的烟囱里缭绕升起。

sentences.en: By a curious twist of fate, cricket was also my favourite sport.
sentences.cn: 让人感到惊奇的是，板球碰巧也是我最喜欢的运动。

sentences.en: Give the knob a twist.
sentences.cn: 拧一下门把.

sentences.en: He smiled, a slow cynical twist of his lips.
sentences.cn: 他笑了，嘴巴慢慢一歪，带着嘲笑的意味。

sentences.en: He’s always trying to twist my words and make me look bad.
sentences.cn: 他总是要曲解我的话，丑化我的形象。

sentences.en: Her hands began to twist the handles of the bag she carried.
sentences.cn: 她的双手开始拧她拎着的那个包的拎柄。

sentences.en: His answer showed a mental twist.
sentences.cn: 他的回答显示了心智失常.

sentences.en: If you twist my arm, I'll stay for a second beer.
sentences.cn: 如果你向我施压的话，我会留下来喝第二杯啤酒

sentences.en: It is the turn of Latvia to twist the knife.
sentences.cn: 轮到拉特维亚落井下石了。

sentences.en: Olive Twist was serialised on television.
sentences.cn: 《雾都孤儿》在电视上连播了.

sentences.en: Pull the wire tight and then twist the ends round.
sentences.cn: 把金属线拉紧,然后把两头捻紧.

sentences.en: She twisted her handkerchief into a knot.
sentences.cn: 她把手帕绕成一个结。

sentences.en: She twisted her head sideways and looked toward the door.
sentences.cn: 她把头转向一边，朝门口看去。

sentences.en: The bag is resealed with a simple twist of the valve.
sentences.cn: 只需拧一下阀门，气囊就能重新密封。

sentences.en: The battle of the sexes also took a new twist.
sentences.cn: 两性之争也出现了新的变数。

sentences.en: the games she plays &B{drive} me &B{round the twist}.
sentences.cn: 她玩的游戏令我发疯。

sentences.en: The roads twist round hairpin bends.
sentences.cn: 道路呈U字形蜿蜒曲折。

sentences.en: the twists and turns of her political career.
sentences.cn: 她政治生涯中的变迁。

sentences.en: Too much force will twist the key.
sentences.cn: 用力过猛会把钥匙扭弯.

sentences.en: Twist a length of rope from strands of hemp.
sentences.cn: 用几股麻搓成了一段绳子.

sentences.en: Twist the mixture into individual sausages without splitting the skins.
sentences.cn: 将混合物拧成一段段的香肠，不要把皮弄破。

sentences.en: Twist the tourniquet tighter.
sentences.cn: 把止血带扎紧点.

sentences.en: You have to twist the lid off, not pull it.
sentences.cn: 盖子是拧开的, 不是拉开的.

phrases.phrase: twist someone around one's little finger

trans.tran_cn: 揉搓之物，丝线，烟草卷，旋转

to bend or turn something, such as wire, hair, or cloth, into a particular shape
